name: Seven Stars
description:
IMPORTANT, PLEASE READ.
There is a slight collision issue, preventing to finish the game. We realized it a bit late and couldn't upload the fixed version on time, by just 5 minutes... Please find it here: http://kebab.ovh/SevenStars.zip
Sorry for the inconvenience and we hope you'll enjoy it anyway!

Seven Stars is a narrative game where you cannot control the choices you make.
You are on a train, not knowing anything, and must find what this is all about.

Controls
WASD = move character
Mouse = move camera
